name: UnClonedMarketingwithAudriaRichmond
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you are an entrepreneur and you like to stay ahead of your industry when it comes to marketing, tech, and social media, then you are going to love this Alexa Flash Briefing.

My name is Audria Richmond, and I am a Marketing and Launch Strategist. I am also a 4X Amazon Best Selling Author. I strategically consult and advise forward-thinking entrepreneurs, executives, brands, and creatives on how to challenge the norms and be first to do it first when it comes to their Marketing and Personal Brand. 

I look forward to serving you, and you can learn more about my brand at https://www.audriarichmond.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
